text: was a Japanese Liberal Democratic Party politician. He was the Minister of Finance in the first Cabinet of Shinzō Abe, from 2001 to 2007. He was a member of the House of Representatives from 1983 until 2009. Omi was born in Numata, Japan. Omi died on 14 April 2022 from pneumonia in Tokyo, Japan at the age of 89.尾身幸次さん死去 元財務相、群馬1区 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Gunma Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of finance of Japan
title: Kōji Omi
